description: Gets a GatewayResponse of a specified response type on the given RestApi.

parameters.name: restApiId
parameters.description: The string identifier of the associated RestApi.

parameters.name: responseType
parameters.description: The response type of the associated GatewayResponse.

nested_items.name: responseType
nested_items.description: The response type of the associated GatewayResponse.

nested_items.name: statusCode
nested_items.description: The HTTP status code for this GatewayResponse.

nested_items.name: responseParameters
nested_items.description: Response parameters (paths, query strings and headers) of the GatewayResponse as a string-to-string map of key-value pairs.

nested_items.name: responseTemplates
nested_items.description: Response templates of the GatewayResponse as a string-to-string map of key-value pairs.

nested_items.name: defaultResponse
nested_items.description: A Boolean flag to indicate whether this GatewayResponse is the default gateway response ( true) or not ( false). A default gateway response is one generated by API Gateway without any customization by an API developer.
